body:
Hey guys, I have been studying and messing with settings with Bandicam, and I finally have posted my first video! The video is a start, with only music, but soon I will get a mic and better equipment. Please support this channel because of how much of an impact it will make on me. In the future, I plan to bring better content (mainly walls). I played around with the settings enough that I get a whopping 100+ FPS in MC alone. I also messed with the settings so far to still make the video look sort of HD. Can't wait to see where this turns into, maybe I will suck and I will stay at 1 sub from my friend, or I will get 1k subs.. lmao xD.      Please help out, thanks!  
1st Video on Badlion: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PQRJj4VI8UA Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCC3uRT3by20GQR6321T73KA    P.S: I am subbed to many videos, so you can stalk what I like ;3
